actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for the free entry of a ring of eight bells for the use of Kalamazoo College, Kalamazoo, Michigan.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free entry of a ring of bells for the use of a college in Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the free entry of a ring of eight bells for the use of Kalamazoo College, Kalamazoo, Michigan.
